notes: The positions are on a characters grid, the size of the grid can be requested from `termSize()`.
shortDescription: Changes the print cursor position used by `print()` in the grid variant.

arguments.description: The X coord of the cursor in characters, defaults to the current X coord.
arguments.name: x

arguments.description: The Y corrd of the cursor in characters, defaults to the current Y coord.
arguments.name: y

arguments.description: The background color used when printing (**-1**,**15**), **-1** means no background, defaults to the current background color.
arguments.name: bgcolor

returns.description: The current X coord of the cursor in characters.
returns.name: x

returns.description: The current Y corrd of the cursor in characters.
returns.name: y
